name: Stay on the Ground Blue by Akira

metadata.name: NO WAY
metadata.description:
This work is based on a wooden path as a canvas.

The random placement of the rope to tie the yacht is a great accent.

This photo also shows the beauty of the tent camera.

The landscape, the ground and the rope all become the main focus of the photograph. I don't even know which one to focus on.

The machine you can see in the picture is the one that brings the yacht down from the land to the sea. It was a beautiful day and the sky was blue on the wooden path.
